issue.title: [C++][Parquet][Python] Add test case showing dictionary-encoded subfields in nested type
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6105](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6105). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As follow up to ARROW-6077 – this is fixed, but not yet fully tested. To contain the scope of ARROW-6077 I will add a test as a follow up

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6105?focusedCommentId=16911812) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This was done in https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/7aefa50a440578ec97a0d713097adb8e89005544
